dmca.title: EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder
dmca.body:
________________________________ From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] Posted At: Thursday, November 02, 2006 2:45 PM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: FW: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Subject: RE: FW: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder To Whom It May Concern: We have recheck www.audioresolution.com and there is one infringing URL remaining. Once this is removed please email me and I will recheck the website. If you are in compliance I will close the case concerning audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder. http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4831/99231_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html Thank you for your attention to this matter. Barbara Davis LMS Manager Net Enforcers Inc. BDavis@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. ________________________________ From: Barbara Davis Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2006 11:16 AM To: 'DMCA Houston' Subject: RE: FW: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder The Planet, Here are the infringing URL's you requested. If you have any further question please contact me at Bdavis@netenforcers.com. http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4831/99231_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4834/99232_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4844/99284_minidv_digital_camcorder_black.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4853/99285_minidv_digital_camcorder.html http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4929/99283_minidv_camcorder.html Thank you, Barbara Davis LMS Manager Net Enforcers Inc. BDavis@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. -----Original Message----- From: DMCA Houston [mailto:DMCAHouston@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, October 30, 2006 6:35 PM To: Barbara Davis Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org Subject: FW: FW: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Please provide us with the specific URLs which is infringing upon your client's copyright. Thank you, Legal Response Team > > -----Original Message----- > From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Friday, October > 27, 2006 8:37 AM Posted To: DMCA Houston > Conversation: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up > audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder > Subject: [EV1-C1561859V] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up > audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder > > > ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== > 1. DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder Added by > system at Friday, Oct 27 2006 12:28 pm > X-MailFrom: bdavis@netenforcers.com > X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net > Received: from [207.218.192.101] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for > ; Fri Oct 27 13:29:16 2006 > Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net > (SMTP32) id A000006C4; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:28:05 -0500 > Received: from mx03.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.229] by mail.ev1.net with ESMTP > (SMTPD32-6.06) id AFA6518A010E; Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:27:59 -0500 > Return-path: > Delivery-date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 13:29:05 -0500 > Received: from [69.25.50.217] (helo=outbound.mse9.exchange.ms) by > mx03.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) > with esmtp (Exim) id 1GdWS1-000LXb-EA for abuse@ev1.net; Fri, 27 Oct > 2006 13:29:05 -0500 > X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 > Content-class: urn:content-classes:message > MIME-Version: 1.0 > Content-Type: multipart/related; > type="multipart/alternative"; > boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6F9F5.C52D1EBC" > Subject: DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony Camcorder > Date: Fri, 27 Oct 2006 14:29:02 -0400 > Message-ID: > > X-MS-Has-Attach: yes > X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: > Thread-Topic: DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up audioresolution.com/Sony > Camcorder > Thread-Index: Acb59cbOLIY+hrqoSwKTgxOhHZFiAw== > From: "Barbara Davis" > To: > Cc: > X-Declude-Sender: bdavis@netenforcers.com [207.218.221.229] > X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] > X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx03.filter.theplanet.com ([207.218.221.229]). > > (multipart/related) > Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This is a multi-part message in MIME format. > > (multipart/alternative) > MIME element (text/plain) > To whom it may concern, > > > > This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.audioresolution.com and our client Sony Camcorder. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 10/05/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 10/31/2006. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at bdavis@netenforcers.com. > > > > Sincerely, > > > > > > ISP CEASE AND DESIST LETTER > > > > 10/18/2006 > > 7155 5474 4100 4346 4372 > > VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL > > RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED > > > > Everyones Internet > > Chris Newcomb > > 390 Benmar Dr. Ste. 200, > > Houston, TX. 77060 > > > > Re: Unauthorized Use of Sony'S Trademarks and/or Copyrighted > Materials > > > > Dear Designated Agent: > > > > We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials. > > > > Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials. Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c)(3)(A) and 15 U.S.C. § 1125(a) and 1114 et seq, we hereby notify you of Sony's good faith belief that your client, audioresolution.com, at the URL www.audioresolution.com, is using Sony trademarks and/or copyrighted materials without authorization by Sony, its agents, or the law, specifically with respect to camcorder products sold by Sony's Personal Mobile Imaging Division. Sony has a good faith belief that the information contained in this letter is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Sony. > > > > The specific works, graphics or other material Sony believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Sony's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by audioresolution.com are listed below this paragraph. > > > > http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4831/9 > 9231_hi8_handycam_2_5_lcd_20x_op.html > > http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4840/9 > 9236_sony_8mm_digital_camcorder.html > > http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4827/9 > 4584_sony_hdv_handycam_camcorder.html > > http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4829/9 > 8465_sony_dvd_handycam_camcorder.html > > http://www.audioresolution.com/content-product_info/products_id-4843/9 > 9282_sony_minidv_camcorder.html > > > > There are various additional locations of infringement on www.audioresolution.com website. The above list is a specific sample of some of these, but all infringements need to be addressed. > > > > > > Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c)(1)(C), Sony hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. > > > > > > If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communications should be in writing. Sony has authorized Net Enforcers to handle and resolve this matter with you. Please do not contact Sony directly, as Sony will simply refer the matter back to Net Enforcers. If your designated agent or representation does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 10/27/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. > > Sincerely, > > VCLM Law > > > > Lance C. Venable > > Attorney at Law > > > > LCV/roc > > > > > > > > > > Barbara Davis > > LMS Manager > > Net Enforcers Inc. > > BDavis@netenforcers.com > compliance.management@netenforcers.com > > > > The Online Enforcement Specialists...... > > Statement of Confidentiality > The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. > > > > > MIME element (text/html) > xmlns:o="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" > xmlns:w="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:word" > xmlns:x="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:excel" > xmlns:st1="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" > xmlns="http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40"> > > > > > namespaceuri="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" name="country-region"/> name="place"/> > name="address"/> > name="State"/> > name="City"/> > name="Street"/> > name="PersonName"/> > > > > > > >
> >

face=Tahoma> style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Tahoma'>&nbs > p;

> >

This is in regards to a Cease and Desist letter which was sent to you regarding your client www.audioresolution.com and our client Sony Camcorder. Your client recived a DMCA Notiification informing them of the unauthorized use of copyrighted images and trademarked logos. They received this letter on 10/05/2006 and was given eight (8) days to comply. The website has been rechecked and I am showing your client has yet to comply. > Please provide me with a follow-up on this by 10/31/2006. If you have > any questions please do not hesitate to contact me via email at href="mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com">bdavis@netenforcers.com. >

> >
